Lesson.Title: Clarify Business Objectives
Lesson.SubTitle: In this challenge, you will choose a vision statement for an app dev project, create success indicators, and create a list of product features.

ParaBlock.RichText: It's important to get your Agile team’s work off on the right footing. We’ll talk about the importance of a good problem statement, which helps you confirm that you’re focusing on the right set of issues. Equally important are the vision statement, success criteria, and scope, which together set the target that you and your team are aiming for as you build out your solution.
